title: fraudulent campaigns
extract: Reporting fraud and corruption. ... Fraud is defined by the Australian Government as 'Dishonestly obtaining a benefit, or causing a loss, by deception or other means'. In this definition, 'benefit' refers both to tangible items, such as money or objects, and intangible benefits including power, status or information.
